title: Precision Works Azan Alarm Clock With Large Display Desktop Wall Mount 4010
feature: COMPLETE AZAN FOR ALL PRAYERS - The Best Help To Remind You To Pray.
DAYLIGHT SAVINGS TIME OPTION - Easy To Change Time At Daylight Savings.
INCLUDES MOST CITIES AROUND THE WORLD PLUS OPTION TO ADD NEW CITIES - One Of The Few Clocks Available With The Ability To Add Your City If Not Already Pre-Programmed.
HIJRI AND GERORIAN CALENDARS - Easy To Read.
VOLUME CONTROL AND TEMPERATURE SETTING - One Of The Few Clocks Out There With Volume Control.
description: Al Harameen brought to you by Precision Works is the World's #1 Brand Azan Clock reminding you to pray. The large display makes it easy to read the Azan times from a distance. Includes a built in stand or can be wall mounted.
